markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spine Stabber](/Feats.aspx?ID=2834) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Shisk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=382" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 124 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

The quills on your arms are particularly sharp and sturdy. You gain a quills unarmed attack that deals 1d6 piercing damage. Your quills are in the [knife](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=9) weapon group and have the [finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179) and [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) traits.

<title level="2">Spine Stabber leads to...</title>
[Piercing Quills](/Feats.aspx?ID=2839)
name: Spine Stabber
